nodes.text: Nath Goordi was a planet located within the Nath Goordi system of the Mid Rim that was home to a procession of royal heirs.

Sometime prior to the Clone Wars, Jedi Knight Seek Ryontarr was tasked with finding and rescuing the heirs. He eventually completed his task, although the heirs never returned home, and the planet entered a war over who would succeed the heirs. Also, Ryontarr never returned to the Jedi Temple, instead becoming a member of the Mind Walkers at Sinkhole Station in the Maw.
